title: Project skins
body: I think that riot should introduce project skin chromas so we can have different colors in project skins like a blue katarina or a green yasuo. just chromas for the project skins would be awesome

replies.body:
I ALSO AGREE!!!!!


......poros don't get much of a say though. You should definitely post this over in Concepts & Creations to get a little more attention drawn to your idea.
